mosinstall.name: Base Vtiger Connection Module
mosinstall.author: Vullioud Pierre-Andre
mosinstall.description: A basic set of classes to create connections to vtiger

param.name: vtiger_soapserver
param.label: SOAP Server
param.description: The path to your Vtiger SOAP Server

param.name: vtiger_proxyhost
param.label: Proxy Server
param.description: The path to your LAN Proxy Server

param.name: vtiger_proxyuser
param.label: Proxy User Name
param.description: The username to connect to your proxy server

param.name: vtiger_proxypass
param.label: Proxy Password
param.description: The password to connect to your proxy server
